original_text: And he turned away from him toward another, and spoke in the same way, and the people answered him again as before.
korean_text: 돌아서서 다른 사람을 향하여 전과 같이 말하매 백성이 전과 같이 대답하니라

sentences.original_text: And he turned away from him toward another
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그에게서 등을 돌려 다른 사람에게로 향했다

sentences.original_text: and spoke in the same way
and the people answered him again as before
sentences.korean_translation: 그러자 백성들이 이전과 같이 그에게 다시 대답했다
